name: Death Trap Extravaganza
description:
small platformer  frog dodge em up  for a  minijam with the themes frogs and the limitation - time limit   -                                                                                                                           controls     a/d/space       ///                                                                                                                                          dodge like your life depends on it while unlocking cosmetics in a deadly trap filled  tiny arena  that has random attack positions every time you play , can you make it to the head honcho only time will 

programming , art , animation , sound fx , music and visual fx were all created during the jam in a bit over a day by me
